title: Private: The Royals
description:
God save the Queen-only Private can save the Royal Family.Private is the most elite detective agency in the world. But when kidnappers threaten to execute a Royal Family member in front of the Queen, Jack Morgan and his team have just 24 hours to stop them. Or heads will roll...literally. BookShotsLIGHTNING-FAST STORIES BY JAMES PATTERSON 
    Novels you can devour in a few hours 
    Impossible to stop reading 
    All original content from James Patterson
author: James  Patterson
